title: Gujarat Unveils Ambitious Growth Hubs to Boost Economy in Ahmedabad, Vadodara, Rajkot, and Gandhidham
description: GANDHINAGAR: After the formal launch of an ' Economic Development Plan ' for the Surat Economic Region as a growth hub, with the Surat Economic Region (SER) encompassing the districts of Navsari, Bharuch, Dang, Tapi and Valsad, the state govt is now planning to announce the formation of four other '...

title: India's economic growth in FY24 to be above 6% on back of macroeconomic stability: RBI MPC member Ashima Goyal
description:
India's economic growth will be above 6 per cent in the current fiscal as the country has managed to strengthen its macroeconomic stability and performance even in a period of large global shocks, RBI Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) Member Ashima Goyal said on Monday.

title: Slowdown concerns! Q2 GDP slips to 2-year low at 5.4%
description: India’s economy grew at a slower pace of 5.4% in the July-September quarter of the current fiscal year, marking its lowest growth rate in nearly two years, according to government data released on Friday. This was down from 8.1% in the same period last year, primarily due to a weaker performance in ...
